page.title: 17THE WEEKEND
page.content: On Monday Peter and I went stoning with Mark, Richard and Edwin in Bridge End field ready for planting turnips. In the field there were lots of metal pieces of old cars and lots of stones. when we had finished there was a trailer full of stones. Richard went and tipped the stones on the railway line while Edwin, Peter and I, went back to the farm to help with the cattle. After dinner we went down to the farm to pick up Mark to go sticking and stoning in a fifty-five acre field. When we were going round the field Richard was heavy rolling in the next field. Also in that field, there were lots of stones. We put some stones in the trailer, and where the wall had fallen down we repaired it. Mark found some old leather boots so he put them in the wall also.
